CustomField.description: This field shows the date when the audit is finished. This field is controlled through the "Actual finish date" of the task that has "Task Category" = "Conduct Audit".
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field shows the date when the audit is finished. This field is controlled through the "Actual finish date" of the task that has "Task Category" = "Conduct Audit".
CustomField.label: Audit Date
